screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .fth file in Foobar2000
screenshot.caption: FTH file open in Foobar2000

description: Foobar2000 is an extensible freeware audio player. It can play many types of audio files and includes several other features, including the ability to create and import custom themes.

Each Foobar2000 theme, or FTH file, includes settings that specify the app's background, text, selection, and highlight colors, its font(s), and its main, status bar, and toolbar layout. When exporting a theme as an FTH file, users can choose to include some or all of these custom settings in the file.
When the Choose Theme Sections to Export window appears, choose the elements you want to export as an FTH file. Then, click OK to finish naming and saving your FTH file.
